SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT * FROM DATA_GENERATE where TypeTrans = CASE WHEN ':1' = '' THEN TypeTrans ELSE ':1' END AND DocStatus = CASE WHEN ':2' = '' THEN DocStatus ELSE ':2' END AND Date BETWEEN ':3' AND ':4' AND ISNULL(NoDocument,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':5','')+'%' ORDER BY TypeTrans,Date

SELECT TypeTrans,Date,DocStatus,count(noDocument) as JulahDocument FROM DATA_GENERATE where TypeTrans = CASE WHEN ':1' = '' THEN TypeTrans ELSE ':1' END AND DocStatus = CASE WHEN ':2' = '' THEN DocStatus ELSE ':2' END AND Date BETWEEN ':3' AND ':4' AND ISNULL(NoDocument,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':5','')+'%' group by TypeTrans,Date,DocStatus order by Date,TypeTrans,DocStatus
